main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in Brooklyn, New York during April 1966.
interesting points: The witness observed the object following him multiple times in a week,The object emitted heat that caused pain to the observer's arm,The observer reported feeling like the object shot something at him,All sightings occurred at night,The object was described as star-like and yellow-orange in color.
sighted object: one stationary object resembling a star
witness description: civilian with an assumed reliability of under 5
